price: “Poslanik koji vam je poslat, uistinu, lud je”, reče faraon.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
